mapper.sql: SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.prConrContInfoGoodsList */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PGB.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'PR002', PGB.GOODS_TYP_CD ) AS GOODS_TYP_CD , PGPH.NOR_PRC , PGPH.SALE_PRC , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'PR005', PGB.SALE_STAT_CD ) AS SALE_STAT_CD FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI , PR_GOODS_BASE PGB , PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST PGPH WHERE PGB.GOODS_NO = PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO AND PGB.GOODS_NO = PGPH.GOODS_NO AND PGPH.HIST_END_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('2999-12-31 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNoSelect} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCdSelect} ORDER BY PCCI.DISP_SEQ

SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.prConrContInfoReviewList */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PGRI.REV_CONT , PGRI.REV_SCR_VAL , PGRI.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , PSC.MD_ID , SUB.USER_NM AS MD_NM , PGPH.SALE_PRC FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI , PR_GOODS_REV_INFO PGRI -- 상품리뷰정보 테이블 , PR_GOODS_BASE PGB -- 상품기본 테이블 , PR_STD_CTG PSC -- 표준카테고리 테이블 , ST_USER_BASE SUB -- 사용자 기본 테이블 , PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST PGPH -- 상품가격이력 테이블 WHERE PGRI.REV_NO = PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO -- 리뷰번호 AND PGRI.GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO -- 상품번호 AND PGRI.GOODS_NO = PGPH.GOODS_NO -- 상품번호 AND PGRI.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_CTG_NO -- 표준카테고리번호 AND PSC.MD_ID = SUB.USER_ID -- 사용자 아이디 AND PGPH.HIST_END_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('2999-12-31 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNoSelect} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCdSelect} ORDER BY PCCI.DISP_SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.getBrandDetail */ PBM.BRAND_NO , PBM.BRAND_NM , PBI.IMG_ROUTE_NM AS BRANDIMG FROM PR_BRAND_MST PBM LEFT OUTER JOIN PR_BRAND_IMG PBI ON (PBM.BRAND_NO = PBI.BRAND_NO AND PBI.IMG_SIZE_CD = '01') WHERE PBM.BRAND_NO = #{brandNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.prConrContInfoBrandList */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PCCI.LINK_URL_ADDR , PCCI.MOV_FRME_CD , PBM.BRAND_NM , PBI.IMG_ROUTE_NM AS BRANDIMG FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI , PR_BRAND_MST PBM LEFT OUTER JOIN PR_BRAND_IMG PBI ON (PBM.BRAND_NO = PBI.BRAND_NO AND PBI.IMG_SIZE_CD = '01') WHERE PBM.BRAND_NO = PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO AND PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNoSelect} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCdSelect} ORDER BY PCCI.DISP_SEQ

SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.prConrContInfoMkdpList */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , CASE WHEN PMB.DISP_STR_DTM > NOW() AND PMB.DISP_END_DTM > NOW() THEN '준비중' WHEN PMB.DISP_STR_DTM <= NOW() AND PMB.DISP_END_DTM >= NOW() THEN '진행중' WHEN PMB.DISP_STR_DTM < NOW() AND PMB.DISP_END_DTM < NOW() THEN '종료' END AS DISP_STAT , PMB.MKDP_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'DP008', PMB.MKDP_TYP_CD) AS MKDP_TYP_CD , (SELECT SUB.USER_NM FROM ST_USER_BASE SUB WHERE SUB.USER_ID = PMB.MD_ID) AS MD_NM FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI , PR_MKDP_BASE PMB
WHERE PMB.MKDP_NO = PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO AND PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNoSelect} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCdSelect} ORDER BY PCCI.DISP_SEQ

SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.prConrContInfoHtmlList */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PCCI.CONT_DESC , PCCI.HTML_FILE_CONT FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI WHERE PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNoSelect} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCdSelect} ORDER BY PCCI.DISP_SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.getPrConrContInfoHtmlDetail */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PCCI.CONT_DESC , PCCI.HTML_FILE_CONT FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI WHERE PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCd} AND PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO = #{conrContNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.prConrContInfoImgList */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PCCI.CONT_PATH_NM AS IMG_BANNER , PCCI.MOV_FRME_CD , PCCI.LINK_URL_ADDR , PCCI.CONT_DESC , PCCI.CONT_PATH_NM , PCCI.ALT_CONT FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI WHERE PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNoSelect} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCdSelect} ORDER BY PCCI.DISP_SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.getPrConrContInfoImgDetail */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PCCI.CONT_PATH_NM AS IMG_BANNER , PCCI.MOV_FRME_CD , PCCI.LINK_URL_ADDR , PCCI.CONT_DESC , PCCI.CONT_PATH_NM , PCCI.CONT_FILE_NM , PCCI.ALT_CONT FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI WHERE PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCd} AND PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO = #{conrContNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* PrConrContInfoMapper.prConrContInfoTextList */ PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO , PCCI.CONR_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO , PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCCI.CONR_CONT_NO , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PCCI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PCCI.DISP_SEQ , PCCI.DISP_YN , PCCI.MOV_FRME_CD , PCCI.LINK_URL_ADDR , PCCI.CONT_DESC , PCCI.CONT_TITLE_NM FROM PR_CONR_CONT_INFO PCCI WHERE PCCI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCCI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNoSelect} AND PCCI.CONR_TGT_CD = #{conrTgtCdSelect} ORDER BY PCCI.DISP_SEQ
